title: Honoring the Memory of Specialist Sarah Beckstrom, West Virginia Army National Guard
summary: Proclamation 10995, issued by the President of the United States on December 4, 2025, orders that the U.S. flag be flown at half-staff until sunset on December 4, 2025, to honor the memory of Specialist Sarah Beckstrom of the West Virginia Army National Guard. This directive applies to all federal buildings, military installations, naval vessels, and U.S. facilities abroad.
